title: Burn
description: 5 EXTINCTION LEVEL EVENTS HAVE ALREADY HAPPENED. CAN HUMANITY SURVIVE A 6TH?In two weeks life on Earth would end. Victoria Phillips was one of the fortunate ones, she'd won a spot in Earth's underground sanctuary. Unfortunately, it came with Phoenix Tanner. He'd been sent to escort her to safety, but the man drove her nuts with his arrogant, annoying, sexist attitude. She was torn between kicking his shins and running her nails down his back, tracing that delicious tattoo.She was relieved when they picked up more winners, and his attention shifted away from her. But the more time the group spent together; the more she got to know Nixâ€¦ she began to suspect that the lottery wasn't all that random after all
author: Helen Hyland
